verses.verse: Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had broken <S%H5422>down<s%>; and he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H842>Asheroth<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and served <S%H5647>them<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, whereof <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, In <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall my <S%H8034>name<s%> be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

He also <S%H5674>made<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>; and he practised <S%H6049>augury<s%>, and used <S%H5172>enchantments<s%>, and practised <S%H3784>sorcery<s%>, and <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with them that had familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and with <S%H3049>wizards<s%>: he <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%> of the <S%H5566>idol<s%>, which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>, in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, of which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> and to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, In this <S%H1004>house<s%>, and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, will I <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5865>ever<s%>:

neither will I any <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from off the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5975>appointed<s%> for your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H518>if<s%> only they will <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H518>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8451>them<s%>, even all the law and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> given <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8582>seduced<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, so that they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8582>evil<s%> <S%H7451>more<s%> than did the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and to his <S%H5971>people<s%>; but they gave no <S%H7181>heed<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them the captains <S%H8269>of<s%> the host <S%H8269>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, who <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H631>chains<s%>, and bound him with <S%H5178>fetters<s%>, and <S%H3212>carried<s%> <S%H631>him<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And when he was in <S%H6887>distress<s%>, he <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3665>humbled<s%> himself <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H6279>him<s%>; and he was entreated of <S%H8085>him<s%>, and heard his <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, and brought him <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> into his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>. Then <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> he was <S%H430>God<s%>.

Now after <S%H310>this<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an outer <S%H2346>wall<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, on the west <S%H4628>side<s%> of <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>, <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, even to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> at the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>; and he <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H6077>Ophel<s%> about with <S%H1361>it<s%>, and raised it up to a very great <S%H3966>height<s%>: and he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> in all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And he took <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and the <S%H5566>idol<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and all the <S%H4196>altars<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> up the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H2076>offered<s%> thereon <S%H8002>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%> and of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, and <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> still in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, but only unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> unto his <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2374>seers<s%> that <S%H1696>spake<s%> to him in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1697>behold<s%>, they are written among the acts of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

His <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6279>also<s%>, and how God was entreated of <S%H2403>him<s%>, and all his sin and his <S%H4604>trespass<s%>, and the <S%H4725>places<s%> wherein he <S%H1129>built<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the graven <S%H6456>images<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H3665>humbled<s%> <S%H3789>himself<s%>: behold, they are written in the <S%H1697>history<s%> of <S%H2374>Hozai<s%>.

So <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>: and <S%H526>Amon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

Amon <S%H526><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; and <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto all the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> which <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and served <S%H5647>them<s%>.

And he <S%H3665>humbled<s%> not himself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3665>humbled<s%> <S%H526>himself<s%>; but this same Amon <S%H819>trespassed<s%> more and <S%H7235>more<s%>.
And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4191>him<s%>, and put him to death in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> all them that had <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H526>Amon<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> king in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
